title: Bikewatching
description:
• Designed and implemented an interactive data visualization using D3.js to analyze and display bike traffic across Boston
  • Integrated real-time filtering and dynamic map-based visual elements to showcase departures, arrivals, and balanced bike station traffic flow.
  • Optimized performance and user experience by leveraging efficient data processing techniques and intuitive UI elements

title: Power Outages Data Analysis
description:
• Analyzed a U.S. power outages dataset (2000-2016) to identify patterns in outage causes and their relationship to factors like region, climate, and outage duration.
  • Developed a Random Forest classifier to predict outage causes, improving accuracy by 18.6% and increasing F1-score by 29.5% through feature engineering and hyperparameter optimization.
  • Conducted fairness analysis to assess model performance across US states, concluding no significant precision bias between large and small populations.

title: Meteorite Data Analysis
description:
• Analyzed meteorite landing data using hypothesis tests, permutation tests, and bootstrap methods to explore patterns in meteorite masses and geographic distribution.
  • Performed data simulations to assess the impact of continent-specific factors and time periods on meteorite size and frequency using Python and statistical techniques.
  • Implemented hypothesis tests and confidence intervals to evaluate the relationship between meteorite mass and continent-specific trends, including the impact of the 2000s on observed meteorite data.

title: A Data-Driven Analysis of Taylor Swift's Music
description:
• Created interactive Matplotlib visualizations to analyze Taylor Swift's musical trends, including song releases, relationships between audio features, and tone of lyrics.
  • Developed a song recommender system by applying Euclidean distance to compare audio features, allowing users to find similar Taylor Swift songs based on a chosen track from the Spotify's Billions Club list.
  • Used natural language processing with TF-IDF to extract key themes from lyrics in the Lover album, generating word clouds and identifying song-specific keywords to summarize the album's narrative.

title: Climate Change Anomalies Analysis
description:
• Used real-world climate change datasets and led a team of peers under expert guidance to investigate the intricate relationship between carbon dioxide levels and global temperature anomalies.
  • Utilized Python, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, and advanced data visualization tools, to perform comprehensive statistical analyses to uncover valuable insights regarding climate change and fluctuating global temperatures.
  • Subsequently presented our key findings to mentors and peers.
